title: New Administration, Carla's Reality Update, Sheryl Underwood, Junior Poetry and more.
itunes:title: New Administration, Carla's Reality Update, Sheryl Underwood, Junior Poetry and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! It's a new day yes it is. We got a great show lined up just for you. The Chief Love Officer explains to us how strong the word hate is. The crew shared their thoughts on the artists that performed and were very impressed with the fashion as well. 46 vowed to heal the nation in his inaugural speech. Steve commented on how refreshing is was to hear the tone of unity and sense. Not to be outdone, our resident poet has a new one called "How Come Nobody Called Me" just in time for the new administration. Sheryl Underwood loved how Jenny From The Block went bilingual. Reality Update was all about Ready To Love and both Carla and Tommy talked about the reunion show. Amanda Gorman stole the show at the inauguration yesterday with her poem "The Hill We Climb" as she addressed the nation. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve spoke about how today brought back normalcy to the White House.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
